text:
Live nearby and can't believe I haven't been sooner. Guess because it never seemed busy. 
Intimate place, great for couples or double date. 
Very good seafood at reasonable price for a higher end restaurant. 
Good <wine> list. 
G
Try the most excellent <creme brûlée> - one of the best in Madison as they add a little liquor to the sugar before carmelizing the top and it is outstanding. 
Also, sides are very good and reasonably priced. 
Service last Friday was excellent. We went in late, and they made us feel very welcome and not rushed at all, which is more than one can say for some of our other high end restaurants in town.
